law.text: The department shall promulgate administrative regulations as necessary, issue forms and instructions, and take all actions necessary to implement the provisions of KRS 131.410 to 131.445. The department shall extensively publicize the tax amnesty program in order to maximize the public awareness of and participation in the program.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 138, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1988 ch. 322, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988.
